About Bryans Steaks Bryans Steaks is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1212 50th St in Lubbock, TX . Bryans Steaks has been described as an Exceptional Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 7 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Bryans Steaks
All Reviews for Bryans Steaks
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
7
Decor
7
Service
7
I highly reccomend this Shanghai-style restaurant. Their portions are large and their food is high quality, with a unique authentic taste. Not only that, their waiters are very friendly and the manager really tries to get to know his customers. They also deliver and they are always on time and their prices are fair. Anyone who loves Chinese food must try this restaurant, it is simply the best.
Overall Rating
7
"Exceptional"
